title: Early Incentive for Launch Partners
body:
# **Introduction**

This proposal aims to reward our launch partners for contributing feedback to our documentation. See the docs here: [Web3API Docs](https://docs.web3api.dev/).

Feedback will be completed on this [Typeform](https://web3api.typeform.com/to/hSOwDzHy) survey (note: this link may be deprecated when the Typeform updates. If it does, then request a new link from @keeevin#7783 on Discord).

# **Proposal**

The proposal will earmark a reward pool (see below for pool options) as incentive for LPs to complete and provide feedback for up to 3 guides:

1. [Create a Web3API](https://docs.web3api.dev/developers/create-as-web3api),
2. [Integrate Web3API into a dApp](https://docs.web3api.dev/developers/create-js-dapp),
3. [Create a Plugin](https://docs.web3api.dev/developers/create-js-plugin)

# **Proposal Options**

1. **60 W3API tokens total**
- 1 W3API token per guide and feedback form completed (3 Max per LP, limited to 20 LPs)
2. **60 W3API tokens total**
- 2 W3API tokens per guide and feedback form completed (Max 6 per LP, limited to 10 LPs)
3. **0 W3API tokens** (Reject proposal)
- We will not move forward with this incentive program.
4. **Request changes**
- Message in Discord #ops channel with any requested changes you have for this proposal.

Thank you!
author: 0x937F5b32Bc3cafcd1B02462F93e6AE5a843f6C6A
